To start, I have 50 profiles, each one of which filters out different
things, such as a certain URI that lead to unwanted ones and things
like that. 
I'm trying to team things up. Sites that have things in common go to
the same profile but still things are quite complicated. You see I'm
going to take those ARCs and play around with them with Perl using
certain modules that do parsing (XML::Xpath for example) and then feed
the results into some MySQL tables I have prepared...So I need as
"clean" ARCs as possible. Furthermore, all crawling must be done
through cron jobs or some other kind of scheduling scheme to automate
the process, because if not automated, just the spidering part of the
project would need a person to contuct it...
If those sites had RSS feeds everything would be easier but
unfortunately here in Greece, sites are very ugly and primitive.
I'm not crawling sites for fun at the moment, I'm into a project...

Anyway, I thing all these are off topic and maybe annoying to others
Finally, i'll be here for many weeks so I'll see you around for more
Any help would be great

:))
